DOC.detailed_description: Healthy men woman consume either 2000 mg American ginseng daily ( four 500 mg pill take four different time day always food/meals ) placebo ( 4 cellulose ) four week prior engage 40 minute downhill treadmill jog ( 12 % decline ) speed 7 mile per hour . Participants consume one pill breakfast , one pill lunch , one pill dinner another pill snack either meal prior bedtime . The exercise consist five , eight minute bout jog two minute rest/recovery . The degree muscle soreness assess use Biodex strength test machine ( isometric concentric isokinetic torque ) , self-rating perceive soreness scale zero ten . All measure take several time downhill jog protocol .
